summary: Completed comprehensive RBAC testing for Service Renewal Hub. All backend RBAC features working correctly (18/18 tests passed). Frontend RBAC implementation verified with admin settings access, user management, and proper access restrictions.

integration_issues.issue: Minor navigation timeout during user logout testing

passed_tests: Admin login with correct role assignment
New user registration gets user role
Admin can update settings via PUT /api/settings/update
Admin can view users at GET /api/users
Admin can change user roles via PUT /api/users/{id}
User can access services and dashboard
Settings page visible only to admins in sidebar
Settings page loads with all tabs (Email, Alerts, Users)
Email settings form with API key, sender email, company name
User management table with role dropdowns
Settings page access restricted for regular users
